column5: With a comfortable, bohemian feel this cozy garage apartment is a perfect get away. Located in the heart of the Historic Deco District you will get to see a humble side of San Antonio. A convenient distance to downtown area by bike or car. You can take a stroll though the neighborhood and visit Woodlawn Lake, a great spot to picnic or take a siesta. Brown Coffee House and traditional San Antonio tacos are right around the corner as well!
